text: Mern is a village with a population of 1,031 (1 January 2020)BY3: Population 1st January, by urban areas The Mobile Statbank from Statistics Denmark located in Vordingborg Municipality, Region Zealand in Denmark. The village is a former Railway town at the Næstved-Præstø-Mern Railroad which was closed in 1961. == Notable people == * Line Luplau (1823 in Mern - 1891) a Danish feminist and suffragist. * Anders Lassen, VC, MC & Two Bars (1920 in Høvdingsgaard estate, Mern Parish – 1945) a highly decorated Danish soldier, who was the only non-Commonwealth recipient of the British Victoria Cross in the WWII == References == Category:Cities and towns in Region Zealand Category:Vordingborg Municipality
title: Mern
